categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Elio was a Jedi Master who served in the Jedi Order during the Republic Era. Along with fellow Jedi Dooku and Qui-Gon Jinn, Elio participated in a battle on Shurrupak, landing on the world in a shuttle.
Elio first appeared in a flashback in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
